actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to permit the transportation of passengers by foreign vessels between ports in the United States if such transportation is not in direct competition with U.S.-flag vessels.

summary.text: Permits the transportation of passengers by foreign vessels between ports or places in the United States if such transportation is not in direct competition with United States-flag vessels as determined by the Commissioner of Customs, after notice and hearings.

titles.title: A bill to permit the transportation of passengers by foreign vessels between ports in the United States if such transportation is not in direct competition with U.S.-flag vessels.
